_sText:
**awp_india_lpx**
==================
This is a remake of one of my most favorite awp maps all time. I tried to add as much detail to it as possible.

**Features**
==================
- HDR (Tonemap Controller used)
- Soundscape
- 3d skybox
- Detail
- 32 spawn points

Installation
==================
To install, unpack the .rar file to:

"Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps"

Comment & Rate
==================  
Please give constructive feedback and rate.
Also, if you found any bugs, tell them in a comment or personal message. I'll try to fix them when I have time.

Have Fun !
